divs: Sighting Detailsok so me and my brother was at the drive in watching the dark knight rising or something like that anyways this light came from the south right at us and at first we thought it was a airplane but there was no noise or anything and it was really bright anyways once it got closer we knew it was not a airplane or anything man made then once it past right over top of us i look up at it and i knew it was not man made because it look like a ship from Falling skies it had the same lights and everything also it look like it was scanning us then once it past over it went into light speed or something right to the north of us like it was going to the city of Pittsburgh so yeah it was really something and this is not the first time i seen them in fact i think its the 10th time i also seen them also anyways peace out
trends: There have been no other sightings in Carmichaels
This sighting has never been favorited.
